page.title: 12FARMING
page.content: Most of the farming in this area is {mixed,}with arable, dairy and sheep together on the same farms. A lot of the land is{hilly}and too steep for tractors. Mr Lloyd is one of our local farmers. His 160 acre farm produces many varieties of crops -{potatoes, {swedes, wheat and grass}- and he has 100{Friesian}cattle and 120{sheep which he sells at{Hereford market.}Mrs Lloyd teaches at Ewyas Harold school and they have 4 sons, two working on the farm and two at school, but all the family is needed to work the farm. Mr Lloyd usually gets up at 6 o'clock and his first job is to feed his calves, but most of his time is taken up with his potatoes and corn crop. He usually works until 10 o'clock at night but at busy times of the year he will get up earlier and work later.
